{% extends "templates/item_page.html" %} {% set namespaces = "cmoon" %} {% set library_name = "Type Traits" %} {% set item_name = "copy_volatile" %} {% block nested %}../{% endblock %} {% block content2 %} {{macros.defined("cmoon.type_traits", github_url_src + "/type_traits/type_traits.ixx")}} {{macros.overload_set([ " template struct copy_volatile; " ])}}

Copies the volatile type attribute from type From to type To.

If std::is_volatile_v<From> is true, then member typedef type is std::add_volatile_t<To>, otherwise the member typedef type is std::remove_volatile_t<To>.

{{macros.helper_variable_template( " template using copy_volatile_t = typename copy_volatile::type; " )}} {% endblock %}
